about_the_game:
There's a long-dormant evil festering in Arden, and it has roots in Elsinore Academy. Go to battle with one of the world's worst foes in this new charity scene, set during Act 2's football game.

Also, get three freebie Status points with every character. Because everyone hates fascism, and loves it when it is defeated.

To get to this scene, simply get to the football game in Act 2.
detailed_description:
There's a long-dormant evil festering in Arden, and it has roots in Elsinore Academy. Go to battle with one of the world's worst foes in this new charity scene, set during Act 2's football game.

Also, get three freebie Status points with every character. Because everyone hates fascism, and loves it when it is defeated.

To get to this scene, simply get to the football game in Act 2.
